name: Slime in Time
description:
Get ready for the next 2d Mario, "Slime in Time" is the next greatest RTS game of all time! Coming with slick controls, mechanics to rival Tripple A shooters, branching narratives, life-altering decisions. With the replay value of a $200 game. Everything you want in life is in this game. I'm not joking when I say. It's a complete game compared to "Anthem". 

Warning! 

Do not play this if you can't handle difficulty, We are not responsible for any property damage or physical harm from losing your mind over this. It is just a game.

Disclaimer: This is a work of fiction. Unless otherwise indicated, all the names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents in this book are either the product of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Credits :  Group F "Anthony S, LoganS, Patrick P, and Rosswell C  aka Roz"
